summary: Young girl runs away from her abusive family only to end up in a juvenile detention center for girls where she's raped and brutalized by her sadistic peers. Only one honest social worker shows interest in helping her.
cast: Linda Blair|Joanna Miles|Allyn Ann McLerie|Mary Murphy|Janit Baldwin|Nora Heflin|Tina Andrews|Sandra Ego|Mitch Vogel|Richard Jaeckel|Kim Hunter|Janice Lorraine Garcia
title: Nacida inocente
